Html: when i create a model ie exactly like in tutorial 8 i say boxnode.Model=new Box(4); it creates a box that looks fine in X and Y but the Z direction is very stretched and i cannot figure out why i end up having to set it to Box(4,4,.4f) to look normal any ideas as to why this is?

the Box(float size) constructor does exactly what Box(float a, float b, float c) constructor does. I've never experienced a problem with Box(float size) constructor.

Ohan
solved it issue was the unmanaged Dlls were copied from another computer when replaced with the correct ones i had compiled locally the problem was fixed
